ivardefs.name: actualArm
ivardefs.desc: The name of the arm in the study the subject actually followed as part of this study.

ivardefs.name: assignedArm
ivardefs.desc: The name of the arm in the study the subject is expected to follow as part of this study.

ivardefs.name: consent
ivardefs.desc: A record of the patient's informed agreement to participate in the study.

ivardefs.name: identifier_
ivardefs.desc: Identifiers assigned to this research subject for a study.

ivardefs.name: individual
ivardefs.desc: The record of the person or animal who is involved in the study.

ivardefs.name: period
ivardefs.desc: The dates the subject began and ended their participation in the study.

ivardefs.name: progress_
ivardefs.desc: The current state (status) of the subject and resons for status change where appropriate.

ivardefs.name: status
ivardefs.desc: The current state of the subject.

ivardefs.name: study
ivardefs.desc: Reference to the study the subject is participating in.

properties.desc: A physical entity which is the primary unit of operational and/or administrative interest in a study.
